title: Trump Taps Outspoken Climate Denier To Oversee EPA Transition Team
subtitle: President-elect Trump has selected Myron Ebell, who disputes the scientific consensus around anthropogenic global warming, to lead the EPA transition team.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: President-elect Trump has selected a climate change skeptic to head the team in charge of the transition between Obama and Trump’s Environmental Protection Agencies.
